mainText: Its curious how all over the world the death of someone we know little of causes such an impact. I decided to write a few words to who ever will read this, or maybe no one will read this, but i write cause he was universal person, to some, it meant buisness to others it mean family, to some, friend, to some inspiration, to other leaders and genious. my condolences goes out to everyone, and i think it couldnt be better said, the spirit of steve should always be the foundation of apple.
author: Felipe
